mil3.1.2:1.3_0: “Ke te, bhante, satta, tvaṁ vā satta, gaṇanā vā sattā”ti?
mil3.1.2:2.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena milindassa rañño sabbābharaṇapaṭimaṇḍitassa alaṅkatapaṭiyattassa pathaviyaṁ chāyā dissati,
mil3.1.2:2.2_0: Atha kho āyasmā nāgaseno milindaṁ rājānaṁ etadavoca—
mil3.1.2:2.3_1: chāyā pathaviyaṁ udakamaṇike ca dissati, kiṁ pana, mahārāja,
mil3.1.2:2.4_0: “Ahaṁ, bhante nāgasena, rājā, nāyaṁ chāyā rājā, maṁ pana nissāya chāyā pavattatī”ti.
mil3.1.2:2.6_0: “Acchariyaṁ, bhante nāgasena, abbhutaṁ, bhante nāgasena, aticitrāni pañhapaṭibhānāni visajjitānī”ti.
